name: GOOP (mmatt_ugh)
description:
Done for Stay Safe Jam 2020 and the theme was solidarity 

-Controls-

WASD to move

Mouse and click to shoot.

i have no idea what I was thinking.

Only a couple levels for your enjoyment. 

SFX and Music by Connor Grail

This was a lot of fun to do thanks for hosting the event :D

Have fun.
